records.uncertainty_note: Coordinates are 0.0000000000, but location is specified as 'Karatepe Camp, Mytilene, Lesvos'.
records.context_note: One AFG female immigrant died in a fire in Karatepe Camp, Mytilene, Lesvos. Fire broke out in AFG family container. Husband and 3 children saved. Allegedly no one else was injured. Two containers completely burnt down. Fire brigade investigated, possible source was gas heater or cooker.
records.evidence_quote: One AFG female imigrant died in the fire in Karatepe Camp, Mytilene, Lesvos
